sentence.Network_en: It is necessary for cohering public feeling and inspiring fighting will to cultivate and publicize models.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要积极培养与宣传典型对凝聚人心、鼓舞斗志、推动工作很有必要.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To explore the relation between meridians cohering on the organism and channel and point - entrails effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨经脉线的附着组织与经穴 — 脏腑效应之间的关系.

PerfectNetExp.abs: coherently 相干, cohering 粘接, coherently 相干的

list.abs: 2008-10-18 -- 工业控制英语词汇大全 ... Coherence 相干性 Coherence length 相干长度（谐波列长度） Coil size 线圈大小.
石油英语词汇(C4) ... coherence filtering 相干滤波 coherence function 相干函数 coherence stack 相干叠加.
电子工程专业词汇C ... coercivity 矫顽性 coherent oscillator 相干振荡器 coil 线圈.
...或瑞利散射,Rayleigh scattering,或相干散射,coherent scattering,由于内层电子的数目随散射物原子序数的增加而增加,外层电子所占比例降低,所以波长不变的散射光子强度随.

entry.def: If the different elements of a piece of writing, a piece of music, or a set of ideas cohere, they fit together well so that they form a united whole.

example.ex: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere...
example.tran: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。

example.ex: This coheres with Peel's championing of alternative music...
example.tran: 这与皮尔倡导另类音乐的做法一致。

auth_sentence.content: By cohering with other persons of condition.
